questions.question: Relational databases commonly store data using key-value pairs.
FME's list attributes can be used to let you translate between object-oriented and relational data models.
List attributes...
options: allow an attribute to store more than one value per feature.
allow a feature to store multiple attributes.
allow a feature type to store multiple values.
allow a reader to read more than one dataset.

questions.question: List attributes appear in Table View.
In which scenario might you be most likely to use a list attribute?
options: Calculating a new value by adding two attributes together.
Storing the name and address of multiple community centers that intersect neighborhood polygons.
Using a regular expression to replace values in a string attribute.
